item.title: Teens are using AI, but are worried about what it means for their futures
item.description: Survey shows teens are more worried about AI risks than climate change and social inequality.

item.title: U.S. savers can soon make ‘enhanced’ catch-up retirement contributions—see if you qualify
item.description: The SECURE Act 2.0 allows 60 to 63-year-olds to save more in certain retirement accounts.

item.title: This climate activist says AI is ‘useless, unsustainable and has no benefit to society’
item.description: According to climate activist Sage Lenier, AI has given the industry an existential problem.

item.title: Meta hit with $840 million EU fine for ‘abusive’ Facebook Marketplace ad practices
item.description: Meta immediately vowed to appeal the substantial fine from the EU.

item.title: Fortune’s Most Powerful People list shows how far women still have to go in the business world
item.description: Eighteen women are among the 100 Most Powerful People in Business.
